# Django Velocity

> Modern Django Boilerplate with Service-Oriented Architecture following HackSoft Django Styleguide.

## Core Files

- [config/django/base.py](config/django/base.py): Django settings
- [config/celery.py](config/celery.py): Celery configuration
- [apps/](apps/): Domain applications
- [docs/](docs/): Documentation

## Key Concepts

- **Service-Oriented Architecture**: Business logic in services (write) and selectors (read), not views
- **Thin Views**: Views handle validation, call services, return responses
- **Anemic Models**: Models define schema only, no business logic
- **Services**: Functions wrapped with @service decorator for transactions
- **Selectors**: Pure read functions with no side effects

## Project Structure

```
apps/
├── core/           # Shared utilities (@service, exceptions)
├── authentication/ # Auth services (register, login, password reset)
├── users/          # User management (profile, selectors)
├── permissions/    # Permission handling
└── tasks/          # Celery task definitions
```

## API

- Base URL: `/api/v1/`
- Authentication: JWT (Bearer token)
- Register: POST `/api/v1/auth/register/`
- Login: POST `/api/v1/auth/login/`
